sledgehammer.manager

Class NPCManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.manager.Manager
        • sledgehammer.manager.NPCManager

  • public class NPCManager
extends Manager
    Manager class designed to handle NPC components, as well as update them.

    TODO: Rewrite NPCs and remove the NPCManager.
